sections.title: The Retention Problem
sections.content: Retention metrics were dropping. The engineering ticket said "build flexible subscription management." But I didn't just build the featureâ€”I dug into why patients were canceling.

I analyzed user data and talked to customer support. The real problem: patients couldn't pause subscriptions during travel or life changes. Our rigid billing forced them to fully cancel when they just needed flexibility.

sections.content: Great product management isn't about building what's on the ticket. It's about understanding the problem deeply enough to build the right solution. That 35% retention increase taught me more about product thinking than any course could.
